params.spendingLimit: Maximum amount (in wei) the key can spend
params.validUntil: Unix timestamp when the key expires

changeOwner(address).details: Allows owner to transfer control without guardian

entryPoint().details: Returns the EntryPoint address set during construction

params.value: The amount of ETH to send

params.values: Array of ETH amounts to send

executeRecovery().details: Guardian must call initiateRecovery firstRequires a delay period (e.g., 24 hours) for securityThis is a self-custodial wallet - users have full control like Starknet wallets

getNonce().details: Return the account nonce for the canonical sequence.

getNonce(uint192).details: Return the account nonce for a given sequence (key).

owner().details: Overrides SignerECDSA's signer() to use our custom owner storage

params.sessionKey: The session key address to revoke

signer().details: This allows us to update the owner during recovery

validateUserOp((address,uint256,bytes,by.details: Validates a user operation. * MUST validate the caller is a trusted EntryPoint * MUST validate that the signature is a valid signature of the userOpHash, and SHOULD   return SIG_VALIDATION_FAILED (and not revert) on signature mismatch. Any other error MUST revert. * MUST pay the entryPoint (caller) at least the missingAccountFunds (which might   be zero, in case the current accounts deposit is high enough) Returns an encoded packed validation data that is composed of the following elements: - `authorizer` (`address`): 0 for success, 1 for failure, otherwise the address of an authorizer contract - `validUntil` (`uint48`): The UserOp is valid only up to this time. Zero for infinite. - `validAfter` (`uint48`): The UserOp is valid only after this time.

addSessionKey(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add a session key with time and spending limits

changeOwner(address).notice: Owner can directly change owner (self-custodial control)

entryPoint().notice: Override entryPoint to use the provided address

executeRecovery().notice: Execute recovery (change owner after guardian approval)

initiateRecovery(address).notice: Initiate recovery process (guardian approves new owner)

signer().notice: Override signer() to return our custom owner
